create epic

Source: R/post.R
create_epic.Rd

create epic

create_epic(
  name,
  created_at = Sys.time(),
  deadline = NULL,
  description = NULL,
  epic_state_id = get_all("epic-workflow")$default_epic_state_id,
  milestone_id = NA,
  planned_start_date = NA,
  requested_by_id = NULL,
  config = list(),
  sc_token = get_token()
)

Arguments

name

Required. The Epic’s name.

created_at

Time created. Default is Sys.time()

deadline

POSIXct format. The Epic’s deadline. Default NULL

description

chr The Epic’s description. Default NULL

epic_state_id

int The ID of the Epic State. See get_all("epic-workflow"), Defaults to your accounts default state

milestone_id

int The ID of the Milestone this Epic is related to. Default NULL

planned_start_date

POSIXct. The Epic’s planned start date. Default NULL

requested_by_id

uuid The ID of the member that requested the epic. Default NULL

config

(optional) additional configuration to add to header

sc_token

shortcut API token. Defaults to get_token()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
create_epic( name = "foobar",
             deadline = as.POSIXct("2022-06-30 17:00:00"),
             description = "this is a test"
             )
}
